column3: Latest;Kampong Cham: A case of domestic violence on 16 July 2019
column7: a 35-year-old Khmer husband setting fire to his wife with gasoline. The victim survived the attack
column8: but was left with burns across much of her body.------The source said that the couple fight almost every day
column9: and are often drunk.------Police said that after receiving the information
column10: officers of Kampong Siem district went to the scene
column11: investigate and detained the suspect. The victim was sent to hospital in Kampong Cham province and was later transferred to Phnom Penh.------http://kampucheathmey.com/2016/archives/1081694
